getParametersLike

public static Map<String,List<String>> getParametersLike(String prefix,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Returns a Map of name value pairs from the request having the parameter name starting with prefix. The values of the returned map are always a java.util.List no matter how many input fields are on the form.

Parameters:
prefix -
request -
Returns:
java.util.Map

getParametersLike

public static Map<String,List<String>> getParametersLike(String prefix,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                         boolean stripPrefix)
Gets parameters from the http request that start with a given prefix. The prefix is matched case-sensitive. Optionally the prefix can be stripped in the returned map. The returned map is a map containing the request parameter name and values as as a list.

Parameters:
prefix -
request -
stripPrefix -
Returns:
map of parameters names/values list

getSingleParametersLike

public static Map<String,String> getSingleParametersLike(String prefix,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                         boolean stripPrefix)
Gets parameters from the http request that start with a given prefix. The prefix is matched case-sensitive. Optionally the prefix can be stripped in the returned map. The returned map is a map containing the request parameter name and value. Fails fast when a parameter is repeated and starts with the prefix specified.

Parameters:
prefix -
request -
stripPrefix -
Returns:
map of parameters names/values

getSingleParameters

public static Map<String,String> getSingleParameters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
The returned map is a map containing the request parameter name and value. Fails fast when any parameter name is repeated.

Parameters:
request -
Returns:
map of parameter names/values
